snippet: An account of the June policy meeting shows concern over slow growth was weighed against uncertainty about the consequences of new intervention.
abstract: Account of the June Federal Reserve policy meeting shows concern over slow growth was weighed against uncertainty about the consequences of new stimulus intervention; document offers little clarity about the Fed's next steps.
lead_paragraph: An account of the June policy meeting shows concern over slow growth was weighed against uncertainty about the consequences of new intervention.

headline.seo: Fed Board Is Divided on Stimulus
headline.main: Fed Is Torn on Tipping Point for Action
headline.print_headline: Fed Board Is Divided On Stimulus
